How it works: their is a keystone Mastery in the defensive tree (cant remember what its called) that allows your allies to heal everytime they attack an opponent you have recently attacked and hit with a slow

Ashe auto attacks already apply a slow so its a perfect combo with a ADC
Ardent provides more bonus life steal + Attack speed for your ADC
Black cleaver reduces opponents armour
Runaans allows you to hit multiple enemies at once
Umm, {{item:3504}} only applies AD and lifesteal when you heal or shield an ally...   This would be an abysmal item for Ashe.

the heal from STONEBORN PACT (I looked up the name of the mastery) interacts with ardent censer.

So no it would not be an "abysmal item for Ashe"

now I demand my upvote, I DEMAND IT!!!!

Wait really? Hmm that's interesting. Didn't realize the mechanic worked like that. I figured it was basically just a mark that you would gain health from rather than actually coming through as a heal from the support. Very interesting.

Yeah I just learned about it a week ago. have only played that Ashe support once so far.
its def fun and it works, atleast in low gold elo.

Well as a support main, I might just have to try it....   as long as it's not as bad as MF support. Ick. 

Although another really fun one is to take Bard and do an on-hit build. You can't do it as support because no income but you can rush statikk shiv, then go berserkers and IE, Guinsos, BORK, and Runaans. Once you get your 3rd item and have enough keeps, you start to get ridiculously powerful. 

By the time you are near full build, you're like 3 shorting squishies. Q them, and about 2 seconds later they're toast. 

It'd work a lot better if I was a decent player but, yeah. Haha

I call it "Shields for Days" Orianna Mid.

Between the Mana from Moreelo and Seraph, AP(which scales with Total mana) and the shield (which scales with Total mana) it provides is great, and between that, Barrier and Orianna's E which is further boosted by Windspeakers and Redemption, you become deceptively hard to all in. Very useful for those pesky Assassins.

Windspeakers Ally Armor/MR bonus also synergyses with Orianna's E resistance bonuses.

You still do tons of damage while also being more useful and harder to kill. xD

Consider {{item:3174}} as an option for extra luls at the cost of some damage.
Rod or Frost Cannon are also options over Ludens if you want more Mana and HP.
